reviews.review_msg: Grading criteria is not clear. Most students had to ask the same questions over and over again in order for everyone to understand a little bit of what she wanted from us. Lecture is based on the summary of the articles of the week and her personal experience. Most articles and films are overtly out-dated. Films are over 10 years old. Stay away.

Habiba is a very nice prof, she is very interested in the topic she was teaching. At times questions raised in class were not answered very clearly. Assignments were marked fairly I feel as long as you follow the guidelines she provides. Overall, I enjoyed the class!
